cards.name: Ser Jason Mallister
cards.text: While there are no cards in shadows, Ser Jason Mallister gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jason Mallister is attacking, choose a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it.

cards.name: The Bastard's Letter
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After an opponent initiates a [military] challenge against you, stand any number of characters you control with a [military] icon. If you win the challenge, kill each attacking character.

cards.name: Shrewd Diplomat
cards.text: Ambush (5). Shadow (3). Reaction: After Shrewd Diplomat enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: Arbor Marketplace
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Arbor Marketplace to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. +1 Income.

cards.name: Nightfort Builder
cards.text: Reaction: After Nightfort Builder is knelt, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [thenightswatch] location or attachment, draw it.
cards.flavor: ...Othell Yarwyck and his builders were still off trying to restore the Nightfort.

cards.name: Daggers in the Dark
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, choose and kill an attacking character. The attacking player may sacrifice 2 characters to cancel this effect.

cards.name: Red Ronnet
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While Red Ronnet is attacking, if the defending player controls a card in shadows, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

cards.name: Banished from the Light
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, choose a character. Place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Cersei Lannister
cards.text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows during the challenges phase, each opponent discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
cards.flavor: "The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy."

cards.name: Underhanded Methods
cards.text:
Shadow (0).
Attached character gets +1 STR for each card you control in shadows.

cards.name: Moqorro
cards.text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After Moqorro comes out of shadows during a challenge, choose a defending character and place it on top of its owner's deck.
cards.flavor: "There are no gods but R'hllor and the Other, whose name must not be said."

cards.name: Rhymes With Meek
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, draw 2 cards (3 cards instead if you played this event from shadows).

cards.name: Brazen Beast
cards.text: No attachments. Shadow (3). Marshaling Action: Pay 3 gold to put Brazen Beast into shadows from your discard pile.
cards.flavor: They walked the streets both day and night, in dark hoods and brazen masks.

cards.name: Gifts for the Widow
cards.text: Action: Search your deck for an attachment with printed cost X or lower and put it into play attached to a character you control. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: "Gloves for my poor old wrinkled hands. How nice." <cite>The Widow of the Waterfront</cite>

cards.name: Starfall Spy
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Starfall Spy is participating, return it to shadows to choose another card you control in shadows and put it into play.

cards.name: Blood of the Viper
cards.text: Sand Snake character only. Ambush (2). Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which attached character is participating, stand it.

cards.name: "On a Misty Morn"
cards.text: Action: Choose up to 2 non-unique characters in your dead pile and return them to your hand.
cards.flavor:
Oh, have you seen my boy, good ser?
His hair is chestnut brown
He promised he'd come back to me
Our home's in Wendish Town.

cards.name: Assault from the Shadows
cards.text: Reduce the gold value on your revealed plot card by 1. Marshaling Action: Kneel your faction card to choose 1 card in your hand and place it facedown in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, if it does not have the printed shadow keyword, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
cards.designer: Card design by 2015 European Joust champion, Jesús Valdés Gaspar.

cards.name: Varys
cards.text: Shadow (8). Stealth. Reduce the cost to bring Varys out of shadows by 1 for each other card in shadows. Reaction: After Varys comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character with power.
cards.flavor: "This was not done from malice. It was for the realm. For the children."

cards.name: Ravages of War
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices a character or location, chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand, and chooses and discards 1 card from his or her shadows area, if able.
